name: Aether
description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

c1.name: Raging Vortex
c1.effect: **Palm Vortex** pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.

c3.name: Sweeping Gust
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Gust Surge** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Cherishing Breezes
c4.effect: Reduces DMG taken while casting **Palm Vortex** by 10%.

c5.name: Vortex Stellaris
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Palm Vortex** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Intertwined Winds
c6.effect:
Targets who take DMG from **Gust Surge** have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

c1.name: Spring Thunder of Fertility
c1.effect: The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using **Lightning Blade** is increased to 3.

c2.name: Violet Vehemence
c2.effect: When Falling Thunder created by **Bellowing Thunder** hits an opponent, it will decrease their Electro RES by 15% for 8s.

c3.name: Distant Crackling
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Bellowing Thunder** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Fickle Cloudstrike
c4.effect: When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by **Lightning Blade**, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.

c5.name: Clamor in the Wilds
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Lightning Blade** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: World-Shaker
c6.effect: Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by **Bellowing Thunder** will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder, which will deal 200% of its original DMG and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.

c1.name: Invincible Stonewall
c1.effect: Party members within the radius of **Wake of Earth** have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

c2.name: Rockcore Meltdown
c2.effect: When the meteorite created by **Starfell Sword** is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

c3.name: Will of the Rock
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Wake of Earth** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Reaction Force
c4.effect:
The shockwave triggered by **Wake of Earth** regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.
A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c5.name: Meteorite Impact
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Starfell Sword** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Everlasting Boulder
c6.effect:
The barrier created by **Wake of Earth** lasts 5s longer.
The meteorite created by **Starfell Sword** lasts 10s longer.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Foreign Ironwind
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Palm Vortex
combat2.info:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you.
The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

**Hold**
DMG and AoE will gradually increase.

**Elemental Absorption**
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
combat2.description: You discussed the way to grasp the formless wind with Paimon.

combat3.name: Gust Surge
combat3.info:
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

**Elemental Absorption**
If the tornado comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
combat3.description: You and Paimon studied the flapping of a butterfly's wings.

passive1.name: Slitting Wind
passive1.info: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

passive2.name: Second Wind
passive2.info: **Palm Vortex** kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Foreign Thundershock
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Lightning Blade
combat2.info:
Unleashes three swift thunder shadows that deal Electro DMG to opponents and leave an Abundance Amulet behind after hitting an opponent.
2 Abundance Amulets can be created initially. Using this skill will reset any Abundance Amulets that were generated.

**Abundance Amulets**
When a character is near an Abundance Amulet, they will absorb it and obtain the following effects:
·Restores Elemental Energy
·Increases Energy Recharge during the Abundance Amulet's duration.
combat2.description: You and Paimon discuss the paths by which electricity might flow.

combat3.name: Bellowing Thunder
combat3.info:
You call upon the protection of lightning, knocking nearby opponents back and dealing Electro DMG to them.

**Lightning Shroud**
When your active character's Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, they will call Falling Thunder forth, dealing Electro DMG.
When Falling Thunder hits opponents, it will regenerate Energy for that character.
One instance of Falling Thunder can be generated every 0.5s.
combat3.description: You and Paimon studied the light that flashes through the clouds.

passive1.name: Thunderflash
passive1.info: When another nearby character in the party obtains an Abundance Amulet created by **Lightning Blade**, **Lightning Blade's** CD is decreased by 1.5s.

passive2.name: Resounding Roar
passive2.info: Increases the Energy Recharge effect granted by **Lightning Blade**'s Abundance Amulet by 10% of the Traveler's Energy Recharge.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Foreign Rockblade
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Starfell Sword
combat2.info:
You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing AoE Geo DMG.
The meteorite is considered a Geo Construct, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.

**Hold**
This skill's positioning may be adjusted.
combat2.description: You spoke with Paimon about the final destination of falling stars.

combat3.name: Wake of Earth
combat3.info:
Energizing the Geo deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves.
Launches surrounding opponents back and deals AoE Geo DMG.
A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave.
The stone wall is considered a Geo Construct, and may be used to block attacks.
combat3.description: You and Paimon studied the pulse of the mountains.

passive2.name: Frenzied Rockslide
passive2.info: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as AoE Geo DMG.
